function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in pandemics over the 20th century","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective public health measures, vaccination programs, and early detection systems","Technologies":"Public health surveillance systems, remote sensing technology for early outbreak detection","People":"Global population","Owner":"Public health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Link between climate change and infectious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious diseases due to climate change-related factors","Mitigation":"Addressing climate change, improving food security, and ensuring access to clean water","Technologies":"Climate monitoring technology, sustainable agriculture practices, water purification technology","People":"Communities in climate-affected regions","Owner":"Environmental organizations, government agencies"}]}
